title: Forten and Perrott on Colonization - purpose

content.question: The political position illustrated by the authors emerged in response to which of the following?

choices.label: The adoption of the legal doctrine of partus sequitur ventrem by most of the states in the South
The growing popularity of the ideas of emigrationists and plans to establish African American communities outside the United States
The emergence of cotton as the major cash crop produced by enslaved workers on southern plantations
The increasing importance of the domestic slave trade and the resulting migration of enslaved Africans to the lower South

content.answer: The growing popularity of the ideas of emigrationists and plans to establish African American communities outside the United States

topic.text: 2.18: Debates About Emigration, Colonization, and Belonging in America
